html:
** Shares in gym operator Basic-Fit BFIT.AS drop 5.3% following a stake sale by 3i Group III.L

** 3i has sold 4.5 million Basic-Fit shares at 44.25 euros per share, thus reducing its stake to 5.7% from 11.6%

** 3i said it received proceeds of about 146 mln pounds ($196.92 mln) and following the offering, its remaining stake is worth about 143 mln pounds

** "While at some point in the past this was a major overhang for the stock, the remaining 6.6%stake will be less of an issue going forward," KBC Securities says, adds that it had expected 3i to remain opportunistic and sell parts of its stake over time

** The offer price represents a discount of around 5.4% to Basic-Fit stock's closing price on Monday


($1 = 0.7414 pounds)


(Reporting by Piotr Lipinski in Gdansk)

(( piotr.lipinski@tr.com ))
